problems.title: Find Maximum of Four Numbers
problems.description:
Given four numbers, find and print the maximum among them using nested conditional statements.

Input Format:
Four integers separated by space.

Output Format:
Print the maximum number.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
10 25 15 30

Sample Output
30

Sample Input
-5 -2 -8 -1

Sample Output
-1

Sample Input
100 100 100 100

Sample Output
100

Explanation:
Use nested if-else statements to compare all four numbers.
hintsList: Compare first two to get max1, compare next two to get max2, then compare max1 and max2.
